name: Candy Line Swap
description:
Swap three or more candies to win and advance to the next level. Explore this challenging candy games world and win spectacular prizes! Just match and collect the colorful candies, and enjoy the sweet tasty desserts!

Features:
- Hundreds of Unique Levels, new levels coming out all the time!
- Sweet graphics and stunning effects
- Delicious Sweet Candies!
- Cute and tasty candy design
- Challenging Levels!
- Completely FREE
